meta.core_mechanic: On a 7x7 board, deliver courier tokens from start to throne by sliding or tapping to adjacent empties. The AI occasionally sends a rival guard to chase and block the most promising route.

rules.text: All game actions MUST be deterministic given the seed and event log; invalid actions MUST return a clear error with code and message.
AI MUST make a move within 2 seconds of its turn starting.
AI with difficulty 'easy' MUST use a simple heuristic-based move selection.
AI with difficulty 'medium' MUST use a constrained search (minimax with pruning) to depth 4.
AI with difficulty 'hard' MUST use an advanced search (minimax with iterative deepening or MCTS) with seedable randomness for reproducibility.

properties.grid: 2D array of 7x7 cells; each cell may hold a piece id or null

actions.name: player_move
actions.result: Apply mechanics.move_validation and mechanics.capture; update state; switch to AI; check end conditions
actions.condition: current_player == 1 AND game.status == playing AND move is valid per mechanics.move_validation

actions.name: ai_move
actions.result: AI calculates move using algorithm; apply mechanics.move_validation and mechanics.capture; update state; switch to human; check end conditions

actions.name: restart
actions.result: Reset all state to initial values

setup.initial_placement: Courier tokens placed at the human start area; throne located at the far end; AI rival guard starts near the AI side; all other squares empty.

capture.result: No captures occur in this game; guards block routes instead of capturing

scoring.winner_determination: Human wins if courier reaches the throne; otherwise, determine winner by objective progress or declare draw if stalemate persists

turn_flow.extra_turn_conditions: end game after two consecutive passes

validity_checks: destination must be exactly one step away in one of the four cardinal directions

validation_algorithm.name: grid_scan
steps: Confirm destination is within one-step move from a movable piece
Validate move against game rules and current state
Return is_valid and optional move preview

acceptance.then: Captured pieces/territory updated exactly as defined
acceptance.given: A valid capture exists per game rules

acceptance.then: AI uses simple algorithm, makes valid move within 2s
AI MUST block human's winning move

win.check_logic: Courier token on throne tile after human move

draw.condition: no_legal_moves_for_both_or stalemate after a full round
draw.check_logic: No moves available for both sides

lose.check_logic: Guard occupies courier tile or no legal human moves
